channel.title: People on Quantum Society Austria
channel.description: Recent content in People on Quantum Society Austria

item.description: Quantum Software Engineer investigating real-world quantum use-cases and developing quantum (optimisation) programs at ParityQC in Innsbruck. David is a Qiskit OSS contributor & Advocate. Join him for a road bike ride to geek out on the topics he is most enthusiastic about: quantum computing and cycling.

Quantum Algorithm Developer working on architecture blueprints, operating systems and compilers for quantum computers at ParityQC. Valentin lives and works in Vienna. He hangs out at Impact Hub about once a week, usually Tuesdays. Drop by for a chat, he’ll buy you coffee.
Quant expert and technical lead of the Quantum Team at Erste Group Bank as well as lecturer of stochastics and simulation at FH des BFI.
IBM Quantum Client Delivery Lead working with companies such as E.ON, CrÃ©dit Mutuel or Erste Group. Founder of the Quantum Society Austria. Nico lives and works in Vienna.
